meta.label: Confidential Collaborative Computation
meta.description: Extract the result from a computation run on Cipher Compute

params.name: orchestrator_url
params.label: URL of the orchestrator
params.description: The base URL of the orchestrator server e.g. http://orchestrator.company.com

params.name: orchestrator_username
params.label: Orchestrator username
params.description: The username to use to access the orchestrator

params.name: orchestrator_password
params.label: Orchestrator user password
params.description: The password to use to access the orchestrator
